text: Pavol Biroš (1 April 1953 – 13 August 2020)Zomrel bývalý československý futbalový reprezentant was a Czechoslovak football player. He played as a defender. He was born in Prešov, Czechoslovakia. During his club career he played for Slavia Prague and Tatran Prešov. Biroš made a total of 212 appearances in the Czechoslovak First League, scoring once. He earned 9 caps for the Czechoslovakia national football team. Biroš died on 13 August 2020 in Prešov from heart disease, aged 67. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Slovak footballers Category:Czechoslovak footballers
title: Pavol Biroš
